Uses of Class
model.Month

  • Packages that use Month 
    Package Description
    model  

    • Uses of Month in model

      Methods in model that return Month 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Month Year.getMonth(int monthNum)
      This method is a getter for the Year's months, taking in the month number to grab and returning the month object.
      Month Year.getMonth(java.lang.String monthName)
      This method is a getter for the Year's months, taking in the month name to grab and returning the month object.
      Constructor parameters in model with type arguments of type Month 
      Constructor and Description
      Year(int year, java.util.List<Month> months)
      This method takes in a year as well as a list of months and does the same thing as the above constructor using fillMonthNames() and a loop.
